question:
Consider the following matches:
  1. Almatti Dam - Krishna river
  2. Pulichintala project - Cauvery River
  3. Polavaram Project - Godavari River
Which among the above is / are correct matches?
explanation:
Almatti Dam
The Almatti Dam is a dam project on the Krishna River in North Karnataka.
Pulichintala project
The Pulichintala project is a terminal reservoir on River Krishna. It has been named after eminent engineer and former Union Minister, Late K L Rao, the Pulichintala dam built across the Krishna River between areas in Nalgonda on one side and Guntur on the other side, is the third major irrigation project, after Srisailam and Nagarjunasagar.
Polavaram Project
Andhra Pradesh has been constructing Polavaram project on Godavari River. It is a controversial project between Andhra Pradesh and Odisha. Recently Odisha government has opposed the visit of a three-member central team to discuss the controversial project and seeking impose of ban on the dam construction.
